    • Method Detail

      • setRootPolicy

        public OobConfiguration.Builder setRootPolicy(OobConfiguration.OobRootPolicy rootPolicy)
        Set rootPolicy. Default policy is OobConfiguration.OobRootPolicy.FAIL.
        Parameters:
        rootPolicy - policy which determines SDK behavior when device is detected as rooted.
        Returns:
        builder

      • setDeviceFingerprintSource

        public OobConfiguration.Builder setDeviceFingerprintSource(DeviceFingerprintSource dfs)
        Set deviceFingerprintSource. Default value is DeviceFingerprintSource.DEFAULT
        Parameters:
        dfs - device fingerprint source to be used. See DeviceFingerprintSource.
        Returns:
        builder

      • setTlsConfiguration

        public OobConfiguration.Builder setTlsConfiguration(TlsConfiguration tlsConfig)
        Set TLS configuration. Default TlsConfiguration does not allow Self-signed certificates, Hostname mismatch or Insecure connection (HTTP)
        Parameters:
        tlsConfig - TlsConfiguration
        Returns:
        builder

      • build

        public OobConfiguration build()
        Build OobConfiguration using the settings that has been set.
        Returns:
        OobConfiguration object.
